content:
I ended up buying quite a bit on Luomi without meaning to.
And then I found out
that you can even upgrade the app!

(Nervous) I can't even imagine...
With new items after the upgrade...
Will I end up with so many deliveries that poor Glenn collapses under them?
Great! My next goal is to build a cozy little house with a balcony where I can gaze at the stars.
Every happy life must have a balcony where one can daydream.

You've already paid off your rent! So quickly?!
From today on, "Hardworking Helper"
will be my title of respect for you.
